original_text: For the priests and the Levites were purified together, all of them were pure, and killed the passover for all the children of the captivity, and for their brethren the priests, and for themselves.
korean_text: 제사장들과 레위 사람들이 일제히 몸을 정결하게 하여 다 정결하매 사로잡혔던 자들의 모든 자손과 자기 형제 제사장들과 자기를 위하여 유월절 양을 잡으니

sentences.original_text: For the priests and the Levites were purified together
for all the children of the captivity
sentences.korean_translation: 포로 된 자들의 모든 자녀를 위해

sentences.original_text: and for their brethren the priests
